item.description:
Hello Everyone,

I would love for one of our meet-ups to take place at one of my events: 2013 Seeds of Luv Natural Hair Fashion Show. It is the perfect place for networking and meeting successful and talented black professionals in a classy/upscale environment. I am hosting this event at Lomabardo's Function Facilitie February 20th @ 4pm - 9pm. This event will consist of cocktail attire, passed hors d'ouevres, champagne fountain, unlimited speciality drinks, comedy, spoken word, fashion show, music, 3 course meal, door prizes, etc.

Our Guest Speaker Audrey Davis-Sivasothy, Author of "The Science of Black Hair" will be covering "Building a Regimen that Works www.blackhairscience.com . Several of her books will be given as door prizes, along with many more surprises.

I would love the opportunity to meet everyone. Your support would be greatly appreciated as we are DONATING part of the proceeds to the LUPUS and BREAST CANCER Foundation. I WILL MAKE SURE THERE IS A TABLE RESERVED JUST FOR PROFESSIONALS OF COLOR NETWORKING GROUP!!!!!! Oh and for the moms.....Childcare is available for that night aswell!!!

Dinner will be served with all SOL tickets
The tickets are $50 general admission and $75 VIP
Your ticket payments are also TAX DEDUCTIBLE as we will be donating the proceeds to a good cause.
For more info and to purchase your ticket please visit

www.luvmynaturalcurls.com
item.name: 2013 Seeds of Luv Natural Hair Fashion Show
